News.Title: Excelsoft Technologies Q3 FY26 Net Profit Surges 40% YoY
News.Summary: Excelsoft Technologies reports strong Q3 FY26 performance with net profit up 40% YoY to ₹13.34 crore and total income rising 29% YoY to ₹75.68 crore, driven by educational technology services growth.

News.Title: Excelsoft Technologies Q3FY26 Results Show Strong Growth
News.Summary: Excelsoft Technologies reported robust Q3FY26 performance with revenue rising 29.92% YoY to ₹713.25 million and net profit growing 13.34% to ₹110.30 million, alongside successful IPO completion.

News.Title: Excelsoft Partners for Philippines Civil Service Exams
News.Summary: Excelsoft Technologies partners with ASEAMETRICS to deliver Civil Service Commission of Philippines' digital examination system CSC DeX starting 2026, with first phase covering 50,000 tests.

News.Title: Excelsoft Withdraws ₹300 Cr Corporate Guarantee
News.Summary: Excelsoft Technologies Limited withdraws unconditional corporate guarantee of ₹300 crores issued for promoter company Pedanta Technologies, reducing contingent liability to ₹3.43 crores.

News.Title: Excelsoft Q2H1 FY26 Earnings Call Transcript Filed
News.Summary: Excelsoft Technologies files Q2H1 FY26 earnings call transcript under Regulation 30, providing detailed insights into business operations, AI initiatives, and strategic partnerships.
